title: Mastery 6 & 7
body: I have some doubts regarding the new Mastery 6 & 7 system. I have been banned before due to being toxic, yes I'm not afraid to admit it. I get a message after each game saying, "You are ineligible to earn loot due to previous behavioral restrictions." As the Mastery 6 & 7 are also part of Hextech Crafting, will I never be able to get it? Or will I be able to remove this restriction if I don't flame? I've already stopped flaming most of the time. I'd really appreciate if someone could help me with this.

replies.body:
if I recall correctly, it's 3 months of positive (or non-negative I'd guess) feedback before you can start receiving hextech chests and keys from playing.
that, of course,  means ACTUAL reports. Fake/troll reports get filtered out and don't count for anything if there is no evidence to support their claim afaik.

Unfortunately, this is not correct.  There is no set time/date/period of when you will be eligible to earn rewards again after being punished.  It is entirely dependent on how much progress you've shown towards positive player and this is different for every player.  For more in-depth info, you can read more in our [Hextech Restrictions Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463).

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/hextech-crafting-now-live-na
> We want to be sure players punished by our systems are making genuine efforts to reform, so the period of ineligibility can extend beyond the duration of the chat restrictions or suspensions received. If they make significant progress, the rewards will start to appear after games once more.

I've seen people get lose these restrictions almost immediately, and then I've seen people keep onto them. I'm guessing it goes by a point system, where if you're commended for your actions (ie teamwork, honorable opponent, friendly etc) it reduces the amount of time you have to wait. However, don't quote me on that, as I don't actually know.

Currently, Mastery Tokens are considered part of Hextech Loot.  Therefore, until you've shown marked progress towards reform and positive play, you will not be able to earn them :(
Ok, thanks man, I will try my best to work towards it.
Thanks for helping me out guys!
